item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster Database eu004 Incident Notification
item.description:
Sep 17, 17:57 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting offer in the Cluster Database eu004 has been resolved.

Start time : 17/09/2025 13:08 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 17:23 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 17, 17:35 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 17, 14:04 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Web Hosting offer on the specific Cluster Database eu004.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 17/09/2025 13:08 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : SharedSQL databases are unavailable in this specific Cluster..
Customers Impact : Customers cannot access their DataBases in this specific Cluster
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 17, 13:50 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Web Hosting offer in the Cluster Database eu004.

Start time : 17/09/2025 13:08 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
